name: A Cute Puppy Shave Salon - eXtreme Makeover Spa Games Edition
name_original: A Cute Puppy Shave Salon - eXtreme Makeover Spa Games Edition
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED!! **
** SUPER CUTE PUPPY SHAVE GAME!! **

Get ready for an adorable, cute game where you get to shave a puppy and give him/her a make over! Wash their hair, dry it, blow dry, and cut it. When you are done, color whats left, throw on some sun glasses, and show your new puppy to the world!!

Have fun!

FEATURES

- Everything unlocked!!
- Adorable cute puppy graphics.
- Easy game play.
